attributes.action: We can do better than a 1% pay rise for NHS staff!
attributes.additional_details: After being cared for and having our lives saved by the extremely hard working staff of the NHS during the recent pandemic, they deserve real support after a decade of swingeing cuts to funding leaving the NHS under resourced, and the incredibly hard working Staff struggling to live and make ends meet. their tireless dedication and sacrifice deserves our showing of gratitude and real, tangible support in the form of higher wages for staff and better funding of the service.
attributes.background: We would like Parliament to increase the pay rise awarded to NHS staff.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
